product_name: BioLite NanoGrid LED Lantern and Portable USB Charger
long_description: Weighing just over 9 oz., this revolutionary and compact power hub charges your favorite USB devices while shedding a powerful array of customizable lighting solutions for your off-grid adventures.
short_description: Weighing just over 9 oz., this revolutionary and compact power hub charges your favorite USB devices while shedding a powerful array of customizable lighting solutions for your off-grid adventures.
